ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Enabling real-time, interactive video generation for streaming applications.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time streaming applications â€¢ Interactive diffusion pipeline â€¢ Scalable across diverse GPU setups â€¢ Flexible denoising steps â€¢ High FPS output
ðŸ“– Summary: StreamDiffusionV2 is an open-source interactive diffusion pipeline designed for real-time streaming applications. It offers scalability across various GPU configurations, adjustable denoising steps, and high frame rates to enhance user experience for creators and platforms.

ðŸ’¡ guarddog | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To enhance software supply chain security by automatically detecting and flagging potentially malicious code within open-source packages and extensions before they are integrated into development workflows.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Identifies malicious PyPI and npm packages â€¢ Scans Go modules, GitHub actions, and VSCode extensions
ðŸ“– Summary: GuardDog is a command-line interface tool designed to detect malicious packages across various ecosystems including PyPI, npm, Go, GitHub Actions, and VSCode extensions. It employs both source code analysis using Semgrep rules and package metadata heuristics to identify security threats.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ esp8266-deerma-humidifier | C++
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To enable local, cloud-free control and integration of the Xiaomi Mi Smart Antibacterial Humidifier with smart home systems like Home Assistant.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Cloud-free operation via local MQTT control â€¢ Replaces original firmware on ESP8285 module â€¢ Home Assistant Autodiscovery support â€¢ WifiManager for on-the-fly configuration â€¢ ArduinoOTA for wireless firmware updates
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides custom firmware for the Xiaomi Mi Smart Antibacterial Humidifier (deerma.humidifier.jsq). It replaces the original cloud-dependent firmware with a local MQTT-based control system, enabling cloud-free operation and integration with platforms like Home Assistant.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ jaaz | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide users with a local, privacy-respecting, AI-powered creative tool for generating images and videos, similar to Canva but with advanced AI capabilities and prompt-free interaction.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ One-Prompt Image & Video Generation â€¢ Magic Canvas & Magic Video (Prompt-free creation) â€¢ Infinite Canvas & Visual Storyboarding
ðŸ“– Summary: Jaaz is an open-source, privacy-focused multimodal creative assistant that functions as a local alternative to tools like Canva and Manus. It enables users to generate images and videos from single prompts, utilize a prompt-free 'Magic Canvas' for intuitive creation, and manage visual storyboards on an infinite canvas, all powered by a smart AI agent system.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ osaurus | Swift
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a unified, local LLM server experience on macOS, enabling seamless integration of local and remote models with existing AI tools and agents through compatible APIs and protocols.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ MLX Runtime for optimized local inference on Apple Silicon â€¢ Support for remote LLM providers (OpenAI, Ollama, LM Studio, etc.) â€¢ OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama compatible API endpoints
ðŸ“– Summary: Osaurus is a native macOS LLM server that allows users to run local or cloud-based language models. It provides OpenAI and Anthropic compatible APIs, supports the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for AI agents, and features a plugin system for extensibility, all optimized for Apple Silicon.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ mixxx | C++
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Performing live DJ mixes with digital audio.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Live DJ mixing performance â€¢ Cross-platform compatibility (GNU/Linux, Windows, macOS) â€¢ Support for various audio formats â€¢ Hardware controller integration (MIDI/HID) â€¢ Building from source code
ðŸ“– Summary: Mixxx is a free and open-source DJ software available for Windows, macOS, and Linux. It provides a comprehensive set of tools for performing live DJ mixes, supporting various audio formats and hardware controllers.
